extendedInfo.description: _ââ âªâ¬ Sound Meter â¬â©ââ_âââââââââââââââââââââââProfessional sound level meter for your device.It measures loudness or sound pressure (SPL) in decibels.Features:ââââââââ  direct reading in dBâ  0 to 100dB+ (decibels) rangeâ  fast meter responseâ  max/min values displayâ  selectable falloff speedâ  5% max error (device dependent)â  A and C weighting methodâ  predefined and custom calibrationâ  vibrating alert on defined valueâ  source: microphone or music playedâ  classic vintage analog lookâ  meter rotationâ  2 meter faces â  18 case skinsâ  freeNotes:âââââ1. Due to microphone limitations on different devices the meter range is different, usually the low end of the scale cannot be achieved because of the microphone noise and the upper end of the scale is limited by the microphone distortion on high levels.2. Devices employing AGC (Automatic Gain Control) will have significant measurement errors and limited range. This is not app's fault.3. If you have measuring problems or doesn't work at all, try to disable "Use high sampling rate" in settings, restart the device and recalibrate.

reviews.title: Works great. Recommended.
reviews.comment: Installed and ran well on Galaxy Note 2. Hope future update would come with Galaxy Note 2 redefined calibration.

reviews.title: Works wonderfully!
reviews.comment: The UI and calibration make this App visually pleasing and technically accurate.
reviews.author: Rob E-W

reviews.title: Very cool display
reviews.comment: This is the best sound meter I have seen on android. Very cool looking and realistic, unlike some others.  I doubt it could be accurate, but its very nice to look at, and does provide way to compare different audio levels. Congrats to the developer. 5 stars from me.
reviews.author: Tony Slater

reviews.title: Good apps
reviews.comment: Handy tools

reviews.title: Meters
reviews.comment: Is there a way to put two of the meters on that screen? Also to put the meters with the tablet lengthwise?
reviews.author: Ed Develov

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Works very well.
reviews.author: Guy De Vos

reviews.title: Well thought out
reviews.comment: Good app. Usually slick display = lousy coding. 5 stars for good code and slick display. This is probably the closest you will get to an usable Android sound meter.
reviews.author: Richard White

reviews.title: Thanks
reviews.comment: Well...  This worked great until last night when I did the upgrade...   now meter oscillates around 45db... rendering it useless.  I can\'t even restore to the previous version that tracked well with my real db meter! (I\'m a CTS).  Regret upgrading...  Droid 4\342\204\242 on Verizon...
